I lost my grandma 11months ago to kidney failure. These two women (mom and grandma) are everything to me. I just hate to think about losing my mom n

Posts.Content: Mar 10, 2017 08:56AM Situationcoach wrote: Thank you for your response. Your response made me feel better. I'm currently at work and have been on google for the last 5 hours. You're right, it is excruciating and I should get off google but it's hard not having answers. I really hope the odds are on our favor. My mom is the last person I have left to rely and trust on this earth.
